definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: Charles finally acceded to the Petition in June 1628.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯最后于1628年六月同意了请愿法。

sentences.english: New packers will petition as respondents and attempt to secure low tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 新加壳将请愿书，应答者，为了能够保证低关税。

sentences.english: They also signed a large petition calling for her release.
sentences.chinese: 他们还签署了一份请愿书要求释放她。

sentences.english: At her table she had a petition related to a big Green Party-related cause.
sentences.chinese: 在她的桌子上有一份和绿党运动相关的请愿书。

sentences.english: There were picketers at the front entrance and marchers chanting up and down the street.
sentences.chinese: 大门口站着纠察队员，请愿者在街上游行示威。

sentences.english: During the two meetings, do not feature or sensationalize news about petitioners.
sentences.chinese: 在两会期间不得报道有关请愿者们的消息。

sentences.english: But the soldiers refused protesters’ pleas to open fire on the security police.
sentences.chinese: 但是士兵们又拒绝示威者的请愿朝秘密警察开火。

sentences.english: Is it that insidious smile with which our petition has been lately received?
sentences.chinese: 我们的请愿最近被接受，那是阴险的微笑吗？

sentences.english: Did you sign that round robin that was sent to the manager this week?
sentences.chinese: 你在这周送给经理的那封圆形签名请愿书上签字了吗？

sentences.english: US petition drive towards ratifying the Kyoto Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 推进美国签署京都议定书的请愿书。

sentences.english: Your efforts can simply begin as a petition.
sentences.chinese: 你的努力简简单单，就是一种请愿。

sentences.english: Add your voice to the campaign now – click here to sign the petition
sentences.chinese: 现在声援这个运动，点击这里签请愿书。

sentences.english: There are petitions to intervene, requirements for standing.
sentences.chinese: 会有干预的请愿，起诉的要求。

sentences.english: We will share the most thoughtful petitions on this site.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在这个网站分享最有思想的请愿。

sentences.english: These names will all be added to the petition.
sentences.chinese: 这些名字都将被添加到请愿书中。

sentences.english: A commission spokesman said the petition would be considered next year.
sentences.chinese: 委员会的一个发言人说请愿书明年将予考虑。

definition: joint signatures (on a letter or declaration)
to apologize for an offense/to offer one's apology for a fault
